en.<h4>FTDI driver installation instruction:
FTDI driver installation instructions

  1. Connect the FPGA board to the USB and wait until Windows finishes the default installation of the driver
  2. When the OK button is clicked, the FTDI driver installer will be launched in a new window
  3. In the installer, replace the (Interface 0) driver of the board by libusbK
  4. Unplug and reconnect the board
en.<h4>FTDI driver uninstallation instructi:
FTDI driver uninstallation instructions

  1. Find the FPGA USB Device
  2. Select the board interface and uninstall the driver
en.<h4>Serial driver installation instructi:
Serial driver installation instructions

  1. Connect the FPGA board to the USB and wait until Windows finishes the default installation of the driver
  2. When the OK button is clicked, the Serial driver installer will be launched in a new window
  3. In the installer, follow the steps to install the driver
  4. Unplug and reconnect the board
en.<h4>Serial driver uninstallation instruc:
Serial driver uninstallation instructions

  1. Find the FPGA USB Device
  2. Select the board interface and uninstall the driver

en.If you are clonning blocks, it is very i: If you are clonning blocks, it is very important than you change block information to identify the new block features.
en.If you are developing a collection, you: If you are developing a collection, you can make Generic blocks that works as templates. When you insert a generic block from a collection, acts as a clone for rapidly modifications without do a copy and clone operation.
en.If you have blank IN/OUT pins, it's beca: If you have blank IN/OUT pins, it's because there is no equivalent in this board
en.In other way, if you copy and clone a bl: In other way, if you copy and clone a block, you make it independently of the original block type and  the modifications only affect at this new block type

en.To enter on \"edit mode\" of deeper bloc: To enter on "edit mode" of deeper block, you need to finish current "edit mode", lock the keylock to do it.
en.To navigate through design, you need to: To navigate through design, you need to close "edit mode".
en.To save your design you need to lock the:
To save your design you need to lock the keylock and go to top level design.

If you want to export this submodule to a file, execute "Save as" command to do it.

en.You can load it as it is or convert it f: You can load it as it is or convert it for the {{name}} board.
You can only build at top-level design. Inside submodules you only can Verify
